name: The Fairly OddParents!: Enter the Cleft
description:
The Fairly OddParents!: Enter the Cleft is a 2D platformer. It is the very first game based off of The Fairly Oddparents! cartoon series.

The plot of the game involves Timmy Turner, the show's hero, wishing to meet his favourite comic book character, the Crimson Chin. Cosmo & Wanda, the titular fairy godparents wish him inside of an issue and the game begins.

The game is a simple 2D platformer, in which Timmy is the only playable character. Timmy, as his alter-ego Cleft the Boy-Chin Wonder, must travel through the various stages to rescue the Chin. There are five worlds, each with four levels, for a total of twenty locations to play through.
